I'm going to attempt to tackle a rewrite of the Smoother Application in Open Glad between semesters.

I'm going to bring it more in line with how my smoother application works in VB.  It'll mostly be cosmetic changes, but it'll pave the 
road for future changes.

[See, I do contribute to Open Glad project from time to time.]

How do I plan on doing this?  I'm going to . . "borrow" a C compiler called "Code Warrior" from a computer on my college campus 
since I'm unable to understand how MS Visual C++ works, which is what I have on my pc.
